snippet: Being swept by the Kings minimizes to a certain extent a breakthrough season in which St. Louis compiled 109 points, tying for the second-most over all in the N.H.L.
lead_paragraph: Being swept by the Kings minimizes to a certain extent a breakthrough season in which St. Louis compiled 109 points, tying for the second-most over all in the N.H.L.

headline.seo: Sweep by Kings Mars Standout Season for Blues
